indications: high uric acid from taking a thiazide
condition.name: High uric acid

indications: High uric acid from taking a thiazide

carousel_items: Drink plenty of water while taking this medication.
Take with food or milk to prevent an upset stomach.
It takes at least 2 to 6 weeks to experience the full benefit of this medication.
Your doctor can run blood tests to make sure the medication is working as it should.

clock.tip: Take after meals and drink plenty of water.

basics.benefits_moa: Allopurinol is a type of medicine called a xanthine oxidase inhibitor. It lowers uric acid levels in your blood, which prevents gout attacks and certain types of kidney stones.
basics.bottom_line: Allopurinol works well to prevent gout attacks and is cheaper than some alternatives, but it takes a few weeks to kick in.
downsides: Can actually increase the number of gout attacks in the first few weeks.
It can take 2 to 6 weeks to feel the full effects of the medication.
You should drink a lot of fluids to prevent kidney stones from forming while taking this medication.

downsides_processed.orig: Can actually increase the number of gout attacks in the first few weeks.
It can take 2 to 6 weeks to feel the full effects of the medication.
You should drink a lot of fluids to prevent kidney stones from forming while taking this medication.

upsides: Works well to lower the amount of uric acid in the body to reduce gout attacks.

upsides_processed.orig: Works well to lower the amount of uric acid in the body to reduce gout attacks.

userStories.tip: I was taking Allopurinol from 2000. I underwent for an operation in the big toe and subsequently in Elbow joint due to Gout problem.

userStories.identifier: 51 years old slightly obese not fit
userStories.tip: I used to use it long term for gout prevention but essentially after a year i weaned off. Now if i get an inkling of an attack, I take about 1000mg and it works to stop the attack. I know that's not the indicated way, but

I'm on just about the lowest dose available (100mg 2x daily) and my uric acid is very well controlled, plus I don't have to been too fussy with my diet (e.g., I can consume mushrooms, spinach, etc., and other relatively high purine foods).

drugs.name: Allopurinol

off-label_indications.indication: High uric acid from taking a thiazide

carousel_items_processed.orig: Drink plenty of water while taking this medication.
Take with food or milk to prevent an upset stomach.
It takes at least 2 to 6 weeks to experience the full benefit of this medication.
Your doctor can run blood tests to make sure the medication is working as it should.

risks_warnings.title: Increased gout attacks
risks_warnings.description: People who first start Allopurinol can experience increased gout attacks as they take the medication for the first few weeks. This is common. Your doctor can prescribe other medications to prevent these attacks from occurring.

description_processed.orig: People who first start Allopurinol can experience increased gout attacks as they take the medication for the first few weeks. This is common. Your doctor can prescribe other medications to prevent these attacks from occurring.

risks_warnings.title: Kidney stones
risks_warnings.description: People who take Allopurinol can be more likely to have kidney stones, especially if you're dehydrated. Drink at least 10 to 12 eight ounce glasses of water every day to help prevent that from happening.

description_processed.orig: People who take Allopurinol can be more likely to have kidney stones, especially if you're dehydrated. Drink at least 10 to 12 eight ounce glasses of water every day to help prevent that from happening.

risks_warnings.title: Skin rash
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of people taking Allopurinol who get a severe skin rash that can require hospitalization or can cause death. These have been rare. Talk to your doctor immediately if you suddenly develop a severe blistering skin rash with fever.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of people taking Allopurinol who get a severe skin rash that can require hospitalization or can cause death. These have been rare. Talk to your doctor immediately if you suddenly develop a severe blistering skin rash with fever.

risks_warnings.title: Liver disease
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of people on Allopurinol who have suffered liver damage sometimes to the point of liver transplant. This has been rare. If you notice yellowing of the eyes or skin, dark urine, or abdominal pain, talk to your doctor.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of people on Allopurinol who have suffered liver damage sometimes to the point of liver transplant. This has been rare. If you notice yellowing of the eyes or skin, dark urine, or abdominal pain, talk to your doctor.

carousel_items: In the first few months of taking Uloric, you can still have gout attacks. Don’t give up since it takes a while to fully work. Your doctor can give you another medication to help until it's working well.
Take Uloric at the same time everyday, with or without food.
To make sure Uloric is working, have your blood checked often.
To help prevent attacks, avoid beer, sugary drinks, and foods like red meat, seafood, turkey, asparagus, cauliflower, spinach, and mushrooms.

basics.benefits_moa: Uloric is an antigout xanthine oxidase inhibitor. It decreases the build up of uric acid, the enzyme that causes gout.
basics.bottom_line: Uloric is a once a day medication for chronic gout, but it takes a few weeks to kick in.
downsides: Can increase the amount of gout attacks in the first few weeks.
You need to drink a lot of fluids while taking this to prevent kidney stones from forming.
While taking Uloric, you'll have to get your blood checked often.
Doesn't come in a generic version.

downsides_processed.orig: Can increase the amount of gout attacks in the first few weeks.
You need to drink a lot of fluids while taking this to prevent kidney stones from forming.
While taking Uloric, you'll have to get your blood checked often.
Doesn't come in a generic version.

upsides: In one clinical trial, Uloric was shown to decrease uric acid to normal levels in over half of the people taking it. It worked better than Zyloprim (allopurinol).
You only need to take Uloric once a day.
Uloric can be used in people with mild to moderate kidney disease.

upsides_processed.orig: In one clinical trial, Uloric was shown to decrease uric acid to normal levels in over half of the people taking it. It worked better than Zyloprim (allopurinol).
You only need to take Uloric once a day.
Uloric can be used in people with mild to moderate kidney disease.

drugs.name: Uloric

carousel_items_processed.orig: In the first few months of taking Uloric, you can still have gout attacks. Don’t give up since it takes a while to fully work. Your doctor can give you another medication to help until it's working well.
Take Uloric at the same time everyday, with or without food.
To make sure Uloric is working, have your blood checked often.
To help prevent attacks, avoid beer, sugary drinks, and foods like red meat, seafood, turkey, asparagus, cauliflower, spinach, and mushrooms.

risks_warnings.title: Gout flare-ups
risks_warnings.description: An increase in gout flares is commonly seen when first starting Uloric. This is due to the movement of uric acid that is built up in your body. While your body gets used to Uloric, an additional medication can help prevent these flare-ups.

description_processed.orig: An increase in gout flares is commonly seen when first starting Uloric. This is due to the movement of uric acid that is built up in your body. While your body gets used to Uloric, an additional medication can help prevent these flare-ups.

risks_warnings.title: Heart problems
risks_warnings.description: In a clinical study, there was a higher rate of blood clotting incidents, non-deadly strokes, and heart attacks in people taking Uloric, than in people taking allopurinol. For this reason it is important to watch out for signs of heart attack and stroke.

description_processed.orig: In a clinical study, there was a higher rate of blood clotting incidents, non-deadly strokes, and heart attacks in people taking Uloric, than in people taking allopurinol. For this reason it is important to watch out for signs of heart attack and stroke.

risks_warnings.title: Liver problems
risks_warnings.description: Because people taking this medication have suffered fatal and non-fatal liver failure, it is important to have liver function blood work done before starting Uloric. In addition, it is important to have these tests done anytime your doctor feels you may have liver injury. This can be the case if you become overly tired, begin to loose an unusual amount of weight, have severe pain on the right side of your abdomen, have dark urine, or a yellow appearance of your skin. Be sure to talk to a doctor if this occurs.

description_processed.orig: Because people taking this medication have suffered fatal and non-fatal liver failure, it is important to have liver function blood work done before starting Uloric. In addition, it is important to have these tests done anytime your doctor feels you may have liver injury. This can be the case if you become overly tired, begin to loose an unusual amount of weight, have severe pain on the right side of your abdomen, have dark urine, or a yellow appearance of your skin. Be sure to talk to a doctor if this occurs.

It takes at least 2 to 6 weeks to experience the full benefit of this medication.
Your doctor can run blood tests to make sure the medication is working as it should.
